name: A Rotting Corpse, Denied their Rest
description:
A1 (tattered mail)
Rusted glaive ([[/r d10]] slow)
Keeps fighting even after a Mortal Wound.
Running water causes [[/r d12]] Damage.

name: Bridge Knight, Tog
description:
A2 (ringmail, redshield)
Hooksword ([[/r 2d6]] hefty), redshield ([[/r d4]]),
heavy coffer of toll money

name: Empowered Refugees, Mohan & Orla
description: Giant punches ([[/r 2d10]])

name: Frightened Draft Horse
description:
Kick ([[/r d6]])
Cannot be calmed by any carrying a weapon.

name: Giant Magpie, Silverseeker
description:
Beak and talons ([[/r 2d6]], wounded targets are
blinded until they rest)

name: Grasping Hands from the Dark
description: Cold grasp ([[/r d6]], on a Wound lose [[/r d8]] SPI)

name: Great Guardians, Stag, Boar & Bear
description:
A1 (thick hides)
Tusk and maul ([[/r 2d8]])

name: Great Red Vulture, Grizzlebird
description:
Rip and tear ([[/r d8]])
Burned and ground feathers are known to
charm vermin into obedience.
Completely silent under moonlight.

name: Its Poisonous Young
description:
A1 (cold hide)
Thrash ([[/r d8]], carries its mother's poison)

name: Jolly Hunter, Maccan
description: Shortbow ([[/r d6]] long), handaxe ([[/r d6]])

name: Lost Knight, Valenta
description:
A3 (mail, helm, shield)
Jagged sword ([[/r 2d8]] hefty), religious symbol

name: Lost Lad, Roth
description: Practice bow ([[/r d4]], long)

name: Lost Pets
description: Yapping, biting, and scratching ([[/r d6]])

name: Mighty Newt, Slippery Starback
description:
Crushing toothless bite ([[/r d8]], drag into water)
Flees if Wounded, regenerating quickly
before seeking petty revenge.
Feared by all venomous beasts.

name: Mocking Bones Conjured into Service
description:
A1 (brass shield), Impair piercing attacks
Hook falx ([[/r d6]]), brass shield ([[/r d4]])
Running water causes [[/r d12]] Damage.

name: Mourning Shadow, Vestige of Sorrow
description: Despair-of-flesh ([[/r d8]] blast, wounds cause SPI loss in place of VIG) Can only be harmed by weapons forged by a creator mourned by the wielder. Repelled by earth from a burial mound, or funerary imagery. Destroyed if entombed.

name: Purging Knights, Dirmad & Duncas
description:
A3 (mail, helm, shield)
Flail ([[/r d8]] hefty), shield ([[/r d4]])
3 firepots ([[/r d6]] blast, sets area alight)
Twins, hate each other.

name: Redmaw Wolf, Greymender, Scartooth
description: A1 (matted fur) Stalk and bite ([[/r 2d8]]) Can bite out a wound to restore [[/r d6]] VIG

name: River Monks, led by Refton
description: Cudgels ([[/r d8]] hefty), bread, mead barrels

name: Roaming Alchemist, Coalin
description: Dagger ([[/r d6]]), alchemical tools

name: Scholar-Knight of the Order
description: A4 (mail, plate, towerhelm, shield) Thicksword ([[/r 2d6]] hefty), shield ([[/r d4]]) Crusher steed (4GD, A1, [[/r d10]] trample)

name: Seeker Knights, Feliz, Gornig & Tayley
description:
A3 (halfshield, mail, helm)
Morningstar ([[/r d8]] hefty), halfshield ([[/r d4]])

name: Shrouded Guides, Hooded Ones
description:
Coldsword ([[/r 2d6]] hefty, ignores metal
armour), pale lantern ([[/r 2d8]] blast if thrown)
If slain, two more emerge from the dark.

name: Sorrowful Knight, Orwan
description:
A3 (mail, greencloaked plate, helm)
Hooked greatsword ([[/r 2d10]] long), oak necklace

name: The Angry Infected
description: Logging axe ([[/r d8]] long) Those directly exposed must pass a VIG Save to avoid infection. Causes [[/r d6]] VIG loss daily. There are treatments but no cures.

name: The Burning Mother
description:
Body aflame (ignores metal and wood)
Fire ([[/r d8]] blast) or grasp ([[/r 3d8]], slow)

name: The Fearmonger in Wood, Glaiburn
description:
A2, A4 vs forged arms (rune-carved wood)
Slash ([[/r d10]] vs two targets) or grasp ([[/r 2d10]]
slow) or spores (everyone in Blast loses their
speech until they leave the Forest)
Can Smite humans.

name: The Promised Child
description: No human can wilfully cause them harm.

name: The Wurm, the Colossal Spite-Glutton
description:
A3 (craggy hide)
Writhe ([[/r d10]] blast) or chew ([[/r 3d10]] slow) or
shower with debris ([[/r d8]] blast)

name: The Wyvern, That Foul Twisted Reptile
description:
A2 in flight, A4 on ground (cowering wings)
Bite & throw ([[/r 3d10]], slow when grounded) or
sting ([[/r d10]], wound causes bloating death
within an hour unless thoroughly washed
out with fresh milk)
Disgusted by the sound of a baby's cry.
Fast but clumsy flyer.

name: Their Cleverness, the Goblin Lord of all Lost Things
description:
Bony needle ([[/r d6]] +[[/r d10]] to anybody indebted to
the wielder), sack of favourite lost things
Can only be harmed by objects that have
lain lost for at least ninety-nine years.
Can Focus.

name: Wall Knight, Annick
description:
A2 (old mail, helm)
Longaxe ([[/r d10]] long), excessive curiosity

name: Wall Wardens, Brin, Catrona & Elish
description:
A1 (visored helm)
Wallerhook ([[/r d8]] long, +[[/r d10]] vs targets below)

name: Woodland Guardians
description: VIG 10, CLA 13, SPI 5, 3GD Tooth and claw ([[/r 2d6]])

name: Wurmshields, Kermac, Cado, Zune,
description: VIG 10, CLA 12, SPI 8, 2GD A2 (helm, red halfshield) Spike mace ([[/r d8]] hefty), red halfshield ([[/r d4]]) Repugnant personalities, always trying to make themselves even worse by mimicking the Wurm.
